channel.title: Jacques Gourde
channel.description: Recent news about Jacques Gourde, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com
item.description:
Harper Government Invests in a Recreational Fisheries Conservation Project in ...
26, 2013) - Jacques Gourde, Member of Parliament for Lotbinière-Chutes-de-la-Chaudière, on behalf of the Honourable Gail Shea, Minister of Fisheries and Oceans, today announced that, through the newly established Recreational Fisheries Conservation Partnerships Program, the Government of Canada is partnering ... "Recreational fishing is a cherished leisure activity in our community and attracts visitors here in Lotbinière, creating jobs and contributing in a significant way to our economy," said MP Gourde.
